title: Betty White, Judge Steve, Stands Collapse, Antonio Brown and more.
itunes:title: Betty White, Judge Steve, Stands Collapse, Antonio Brown and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! We gots a new one for you. The Chief Love Officer dropped a few gems just for the ladies. Steve talks about his latest legal stuff. Antonio Brown did something very bad. Would You Rather discusses horizontal dancing. Steve clearly lets us know what caused the stands to collapse in Washington. We mourn the deaths of our favorite Golden Girl Betty White and star of The Mack Max Julien. Steve wraps up the show with stories about his family.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
